0.0.1.name: wordpress/expanded-admin-menus
0.0.1.description: WordPress 3.3 introduced new flyout admin menus. If you prefer to be able to choose to have some menu items expanded this plugin will let you. Closed menu items still flyout. Open items are saved in a cookie, so while they persist, they don't persist from browser to browser. JavaScript is required.
